name: tm35
effect: Teaches Flamethrower to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Flamethrower to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Sleep Talk Gen I: Metronome)

flavor_text.black-white: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.
